News.headline: Match Report: Dagenham and Redbridge 7 - 3 Colchester United
News.page_title: Match Report: Dagenham and Redbridge 7 - 3 Colchester United
News.URL_keywords: Match Report: Dagenham and Redbridge 7 - 3 Colchester United
News.short_description: The Daggers academy beat Colchester United 7-3 last night in the 1st round proper of the FA Youth Cup at the Chigwell Construction Stadium.
News.description:
A hat trick from striker Joe White helped Micah Hyde's side progress into the 2nd round of the FA Youth Cup.

Colchester took the lead in the exciting contest after Ryan Clampin placed the ball into the right hand corner in the 23rd minute.Â 

It didn't take the Daggers long to equalize as five minutes later a deflected shot from forward Jordy Mongoy found its way into the net, and two minutes later Joe White gave the Daggers the lead scoring from the penalty spot, with the first half ending 2-1.

The Daggers extended their lead in the 57th minute as another deflected shot from Tyrqiue Hyde found its way to Joe White who had a tap in to make the score 3-1.

In the 60th minute Joe White got his hat-trick after a great finish and in the 76th minute Dylan Florence got his first goal of the game after finishing a rebound.

Two minutes later Tyrique Hyde put the Daggers 6-1 up after another penatly was conceded by Colchester.

Colchester then got two goals back in two minutes after Dunne scored a penalty for the visitors and then Mckeown put the ball in the back of the net from close range.

The Daggers got the last goal, and their seventh of the game in the 90th minute after another goal from Dylan Florence to finish the game and take the Daggers through to the next round.
